code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{fetchMLPrediction}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Prediction(_ref){let{selectedIPO}=_ref;const[prediction,setPrediction]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState("");const handlePredict=async()=>{if(!selectedIPO)return;setError("");setPrediction(null);setLoading(true);try{const features={'Issue_Size(crores)':selectedIPO['Issue_Size(crores)'],'QIB':selectedIPO.QIB,'HNI':selectedIPO.HNI,'RII':selectedIPO.RII,'Issue_price':selectedIPO.Issue_Price};const res=await fetchMLPrediction(features);setPrediction(res.predicted_listing_gain_percent);}catch(e){setError("Prediction failed.");}setLoading(false);};if(!selectedIPO)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"ML: Listing Gain Prediction"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePredict,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Predicting...":"Predict Listing Gain"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:"red",marginTop:8},children:error}),prediction!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Predicted Listing Gain:"})," ",prediction.toFixed(2),"%"]})]});}
